title: Saturday Home Comic
additional-note: This serial is not cataloged on its own in WorldCat, but other copyright records note that Saturday Home Comic was the name of a newspaper supplement in the New York Journal American. The copyright claimant on the first contribution renewal is King Features Syndicate. Issue renewals of the Journal-American, and renewals of included comics that also appeared in King Features' weeklies or other publications, may also apply to this serial's content. We have not systematically surveyed those renewals here.
